title.narrative: LIFE-SKILLS INTERVENTIONS

description.narrative: Boys and girls benefit from life-skills interventions by skilled service providers to empower and increase their participation, influence decision making and enhance their capacities to prevent early pregnancy, alcohol consumption and other risky behaviours

sector.narrative: Adolescent participation data/research/evaluation evidence generation, synthesis, and use

Advocacy and partnership-building for social behaviour change
Capacity and skills development for social behaviour change
Development of multi-sectoral legislation/policies/strategies/action plans supporting development and participation of adolescents
Relief co-ordination, protection and support services
System strengthening for adolescent participation and civic engagement (including in humanitarian settings)

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Boys and girls benefit from life-skills interventions by skilled service providers to empower and increase their participation, influence decision making and enhance their capacities to prevent early pregnancy, alcohol consumption and other risky behaviours

description.narrative: Progress to achieve this Output was obtained with successful implementation of more than 80% (10 out of 12) of the activities foreseen in AWP 2019. In fact, the actions carried out contributed to the developmentt of the youth and adolescents' skills to address the most critical social issues that affect them such as early pregnancy, HIV, alcohol abuse and other risk behaviors through communication for behavior change and life skills trainings undertaken by youth and governmental partners. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:22/01/2020
